metadata.Title: CVE-2018-20805 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: A user authorized to perform database queries may trigger denial of service by issuing specially crafted queries, which perform an $elemMatch This issue affects: MongoDB Inc. MongoDB Server v4.0 versions prior to 4.0.5; v3.6 versions prior to 3.6.10. This issue affects: MongoDB Inc. MongoDB Server 3.6 versions prior to 3.6.10; 4.0 versions prior to 4.0.5.

criterions.comment: mongodb package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
